text: jab manushy ko koee takaleef pahunchatee hai to vah apane rab ko usee kee or rujoo hokar pukaarane lagata hai, phir jab vah usapar apanee anukampa karata hai, to vah us cheez ko bhool jaata hai jisake lie pahale pukaar raha tha aur (doosaro ko) allaah ke samakaksh thaharaane lagata hai, taaki isake parinaamasvaroop vah usakee raah se bhataka de. kah do, "apane inakaar ka thoda maza le lo. nissandeh tum aagavaalon mein se ho.
